name: Super Dig Man Deluxe
description: Super Dig Man deluxe is a digging game where you search for ores, rocks, gems and gold in order to upgrade your tools, buy ladders, and buy torches. everything is procedurally generated in a 2 dimensional tile-like fashion. it is a simple yet satisfying game that does not take long to complete but will be enjoyable for players of all ages. search for the arkenstone to win the game!
